Clover SDK for Android

The Clover SDK for Android facilitates development of applications on top of the Clover platform.

See: Description

The Clover SDK for Android facilitates development of applications on top of the Clover platform. This includes services for interacting with merchants, their orders, customers, employees, and inventory. This SDK can also be used for sending and receiving push notifications.

To access merchant information, employee, customer, inventory, and order data, bound AIDL services are available.

  • IMerchantService
  • com.clover.sdk.v1.employee.IEmployeeService
  • ICustomerService
  • com.clover.sdk.v1.inventory.IInventoryService
  • com.clover.sdk.v1.order.IOrderService

For more information about bound services, refer to the Android documentation: Bound Services .

To bind to any Clover service, a Clover Account is required. To obtain a Clover account object, the CloverAccount helper class may be used. To allow the user to select the Clover account from those present on the device, 

    Intent intent = AccountManager.newChooseAccountIntent(
        null,
        null,
        new String[]{CloverAccount.CLOVER_ACCOUNT_TYPE},
        false,
        null,
        null,
        null,
        null);
    startActivityForResult(intent, REQUEST_ACCOUNT);
See AccountManager.newChooseAccountIntent(Account, ArrayList, String[], boolean, String, String, String[], Bundle) for more information.

Each service has a matching *Intent class that defines the actions and extras required to bind. These classes are as follows,

  • MerchantIntent
  • com.clover.sdk.v1.employee.EmployeeIntent
  • CustomerIntent
  • com.clover.sdk.v1.inventory.InventoryIntent
  • com.clover.sdk.v1.order.OrderIntent

Services can also be interacted with by using their respective service connector class. A service connector automatically binds and provides convenience methods for calling service methods asynchronously. The following service connectors are available, mirroring each bound service,

  • MerchantConnector
  • com.clover.sdk.v1.employee.EmployeeConnector
  • CustomerConnector
  • com.clover.sdk.v1.inventory.InventoryConnector
  • com.clover.sdk.v1.order.OrderConnector
